tracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]}},"version":1}

breakSession(address).details: Break an active session early (can be called by user or authorized breaker)

params.user: Address of the user whose session to break

calculateBreakFee(uint256,uint256).details: Calculate the break fee based on elapsed time

completeSession().details: Complete an active session (can only be called by session owner)

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,addres.details: Emergency withdrawal function (only owner, only when paused)

returns.canComplete: Whether the session can be completed

hasActiveSession(address).details: Check if a user has an active session

returns.hasActive: True if user has an active session

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAuthorizedBreaker(address,bool).details: Set authorization for a breaker (for watchdog functionality)

params.targetMinutes: Duration of the session in minutes (15-240)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
